statements: SELECT * FROM building_permits WHERE project_name = 'Construction Project'
SELECT project_name, project_address, issue_date FROM building_permits WHERE permit_type = 'Renovation'
SELECT permit_id, project_name FROM building_permits WHERE issue_date < '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM building_permits ORDER BY expiry_date DESC, project_name ASC
SELECT project_address, permit_type FROM building_permits WHERE permit_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200
SELECT * FROM building_permits WHERE permit_type = 'Residential' ORDER BY issue_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, project_address FROM building_permits WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM issue_date) = 2021 LIMIT 10;
SELECT permit_id, project_name, project_address, permit_type FROM building_permits ORDER BY project_name ASC, permit_type DESC;
SELECT * FROM building_permits WHERE project_address LIKE '%Street%' AND permit_type IN ('Commercial', 'Industrial') ORDER BY issue_date ASC;
SELECT permit_id, project_name, project_address FROM building_permits WHERE expiry_date > CURRENT_DATE AND permit_type = 'Renovation' ORDER BY permit_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM building_permits;
SELECT permit_id, permit_type, project_id FROM building_permits WHERE permit_status='approved';
SELECT project_id, project_name, project_status FROM construction_projects WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT applicant_name, permit_date FROM building_permits WHERE permit_type='construction';
SELECT project_name, project_status FROM construction_projects ORDER BY completion_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM building_permits;
SELECT project_id, permit_type, permit_date FROM building_permits WHERE permit_status = 'Approved';
SELECT applicant_name, permit_type, permit_date FROM building_permits WHERE permit_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY permit_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, start_date, completion_date FROM construction_projects WHERE project_status = 'In Progress' ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT b.applicant_name, p.project_name, p.start_date FROM building_permits b JOIN construction_projects p ON b.project_id = p.project_id WHERE b.permit_status = 'Approved';
SELECT * FROM permits;
SELECT project_name, permit_type, issue_date FROM permits WHERE permit_status='approved';
SELECT project_name, project_location FROM projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT contractor_name, email, contact_number FROM contractors WHERE contractor_type='electrician';
SELECT project_name, project_location, project_description FROM projects WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM permits WHERE permit_status='Approved';
SELECT project_name, permit_type, issue_date FROM permits WHERE expiration_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT permit_id, project_name, project_location FROM permits WHERE permit_type='Building' ORDER BY issue_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date, project_location FROM projects WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT contractor_name, contractor_type, email FROM contractors WHERE contractor_location='New York' AND projects_assigned > 5 ORDER BY contractor_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM building_permits;
SELECT permit_type, issue_date FROM building_permits WHERE permit_id = 1;
SELECT contractor_name, license_number FROM contractors WHERE contractor_id = 2;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects WHERE status = 'In Progress';
SELECT task_description, task_status FROM project_tasks WHERE project_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM building_permits;
SELECT permit_id, permit_type, issue_date FROM building_permits WHERE permit_id > 100 ORDER BY issue_date DESC;

SELECT contractors.contractor_name, projects.project_name, project_tasks.task_description FROM contractors JOIN projects ON contractors.contractor_id = projects.contractor_id JOIN project_tasks ON projects.project_id = project_tasks.project_id WHERE project_tasks.task_status = 'In Progress';
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects WHERE status = 'Pending' AND start_date <= '2022-01-01';
SELECT contractor_name, license_number, phone_number FROM contractors WHERE contractor_id IN (SELECT contractor_id FROM building_permits WHERE contractor_id IS NOT NULL);
SELECT * FROM BuildingPermits;
SELECT project_name, address FROM BuildingPermits WHERE issue_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT permit_number, project_name, address FROM BuildingPermits WHERE expiration_date < '2023-01-01' ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT contractor_name, contact_number, email FROM Contractors WHERE contractor_name LIKE 'ABC%';
SELECT project_name, project_manager, start_date, completion_date FROM ConstructionProjects WHERE completion_date IS NULL;
SELECT permit_number, project_name, address FROM BuildingPermits LIMIT 10;
SELECT project_name, start_date, completion_date FROM ConstructionProjects WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT contractor_name, contact_person, contact_number, email FROM Contractors WHERE email IS NOT NULL;

SELECT project_name, contractor_name, start_date, completion_date FROM ConstructionProjects JOIN ProjectAssignments ON ConstructionProjects.project_id = ProjectAssignments.project_id JOIN Contractors ON ProjectAssignments.contractor_id = Contractors.contractor_id;
SELECT permit_number, issue_date, expiration_date, status, change_date FROM BuildingPermits JOIN PermitHistory ON BuildingPermits.permit_id = PermitHistory.permit_id WHERE status = 'approved';
